abstract: We study the almost sure T-stability and strong convergence of two random iterative algorithms namely random Halpern iteration scheme and random Xu-Mann iteration scheme for a general class of random operators in a separable Banach space. Our results complement/generalize the known stability results in stochastic verse.
meta: Projects: Fixed points of several mappings of different natures over Banach Spaces with complete probability measureFixed Point Theory for Set Valued Maps
